requiredEnvVars.title: Required env vars
requiredEnvVars.description: Environment variable names that must be present at startup.

apiKeyEnabled.title: API key auth enabled
apiKeyEnabled.description: Require API key on protected API endpoints.

apiKey.title: API key
apiKey.description: Expected API key value for `x-api-key` or Bearer auth.

browserPoolSize.title: Browser pool size
browserPoolSize.description: Number of warm sessions to keep.

browserLaunchTimeoutMs.title: Browser launch timeout (ms)
browserLaunchTimeoutMs.description: Playwright browser launch timeout in milliseconds.

browserBlockResources.title: Browser block resources
browserBlockResources.description: Block image/font/media requests in warm contexts to reduce overhead.

standbyEnabled.title: Standby lifecycle enabled
standbyEnabled.description: Enable standby lifecycle manager for warm sessions.

standbyIdleTimeoutMs.title: Standby idle timeout (ms)
standbyIdleTimeoutMs.description: Switch to standby mode after this idle duration.

standbyRecycleAfterMs.title: Session recycle age (ms)
standbyRecycleAfterMs.description: Recycle warm sessions older than this age.

sessionStorageEnabled.title: Session storage enabled
sessionStorageEnabled.description: Persist and recover browser session state across actor runs.

sessionStoreName.title: Session store name
sessionStoreName.description: Apify Key-Value store name used for persisted session state.

sessionStoreKeyPrefix.title: Session store key prefix
sessionStoreKeyPrefix.description: Prefix for persisted session slot keys.

requestQueueConcurrency.title: Request queue concurrency
requestQueueConcurrency.description: Maximum number of queued tasks processed in parallel.

requestQueueMaxSize.title: Request queue max size
requestQueueMaxSize.description: Maximum queued tasks before backpressure rejection.

requestQueueTaskTimeoutMs.title: Request queue task timeout (ms)
requestQueueTaskTimeoutMs.description: Max time per queued task before timeout.

fetchTimeoutDefaultMs.title: Fetch timeout default (ms)
fetchTimeoutDefaultMs.description: Default timeout for `POST /v1/fetch` when request omits `timeout_ms`.

requestBodyMaxBytes.title: Request body max bytes
requestBodyMaxBytes.description: Maximum JSON body size accepted by API endpoints.

cacheStaleTtlMs.title: Cache stale TTL (ms)
cacheStaleTtlMs.description: Additional stale window for stale-while-revalidate responses.

cacheSwrEnabled.title: Cache SWR enabled
cacheSwrEnabled.description: Enable stale-while-revalidate behavior for expired entries.

redisUrl.title: Redis URL
redisUrl.description: Redis connection URL when cache provider is redis.

redisKeyPrefix.title: Redis key prefix
redisKeyPrefix.description: Prefix used for Redis cache keys.

fastModeEnabled.title: Fast mode enabled
fastModeEnabled.description: Allow partial fast responses with limited field sets.

fastModeMaxFields.title: Fast mode max fields
fastModeMaxFields.description: Max number of fields returned when fast mode is enabled.

prewarmTargets.title: Prewarm targets
prewarmTargets.description: Target requests to refresh into cache proactively.

shutdownDrainTimeoutMs.title: Shutdown drain timeout (ms)
shutdownDrainTimeoutMs.description: Max time to wait for queue drain during shutdown.

mockFetchDelayMs.title: Mock fetch delay (ms)
mockFetchDelayMs.description: Delay used by mocked fetch worker for queue testing.
